text: Makhmutovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Arkaulovsky Selsoviet, Salavatsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 100 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 38 km from Maloyaz, 3 km from Arkaulovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Salavatsky District
title: Makhmutovo, Salavatsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
